summary: Anders, Kenneth and Steven (all played by Magnusson) went to high school together. Today they are 38, still living in the Swedish suburb but now in completely different stages of life. This... See full summary »
cast: Peter Magnusson|Hanna Alström|Sandra Huldt|Julia Ragnarsson|Adam Nordlund|Andreas Utterhall|Oskar Thunberg|Veronica Dahlström|Anne Bergstedt|Matti Boustedt|Alexandra Buskas|Yngve Dahlberg|David Eklund|Richard Forsgren|Johan Hallström|Lisa Henni|Ann-Sofie Kylin|Leonardo Rojas Lundgren|Ylva Lööf|Jacob Mohlin|Isak Monka|Aliette Opheim|Filip Palmgren|Peter Schantli|Fyr Thorvald Strömberg|Petter Roman Waldemarsson|Rebecka Wellén|Jan Åström|Johan Berg|Martin Rutegård
title: Tillbaka till Bromma
